metadata.title: CVE-2023-37282 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the VZT LZMA_Read dmemextraction functionality of GTKWave 3.3.115. A specially crafted .vzt filecan lead to arbitrary code execution. A victim would need to open amalicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gtkwave package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
